  • Method Details

    • payRental

      PaymentTransaction payRental(CreditCard card, int amount, String contents) throws PaymentException, UnrecognizedException, IOException, org.json.JSONException, ParseException
      Payment for ren, and then return the payment transaction
      Parameters:
      card - - the credit card used for payment
      amount - - the amount to pay
      contents - - the transaction contents
      Returns:
      PaymentTransaction - if the payment is successful
      Throws:
      PaymentException - if responded with a pre-defined error code
      UnrecognizedException - if responded with an unknown error code or something goes wrong
      IOException
      org.json.JSONException
      ParseException

    • refund

      PaymentTransaction refund(CreditCard card, int amount, String contents) throws PaymentException, UnrecognizedException, IOException, org.json.JSONException, ParseException
      Refund, and then return the payment transaction
      Parameters:
      card - - the credit card which would be refunded to
      amount - - the amount to refund
      contents - - the transaction contents
      Returns:
      PaymentTransaction - if the payment is successful
      Throws:
      PaymentException - if responded with a pre-defined error code
      UnrecognizedException - if responded with an unknown error code or something goes wrong
      IOException
      org.json.JSONException
      ParseException
